sentence.Network_en: We do not want any extraneous information on the page.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不希望这一页上有任何无关的信息。

sentence.Network_en: His account of the fire accident includes a lot of extraneous details.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对失火事件的描述含有大量离题的细节.

sentence.Network_en: I can choose to ignore these extraneous thoughts or certainly choose not to act on them.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可以选择无视这些无关的想法，当然也可以选择不按这些想法行事。

entry.def: Extraneous things are not relevant or essential to the situation you are involved in or the subject you are talking about.

example.ex: We ought not to bring in extraneous matters in trying to find a basis for a settlement...
example.tran: 我们努力寻求解决问题的基础时，不应该牵扯进无关的事情。

example.ex: I can choose to ignore these extraneous thoughts or certainly choose not to act on them.
example.tran: 我可以选择无视这些无关的想法，当然也可以选择不按这些想法行事。

means.word_mean: 1. not pertinent to the matter under consideration;

sentences.sentence: "mentioned several impertinent facts before finally coming to the point"
"the ballet struck me as extraneous and somewhat out of keeping with the rest of the play"

means.word_mean: 3. not belonging to that in which it is contained; introduced from an outside source;

sentences.sentence: "extraneous light in the camera spoiled the photograph"

auth_sentence.content: An extraneous body can be...easily introduced into their bladder.

auth_sentence.content: That would involve no extraneous additional pressure on the defendant.
auth_sentence.res_content: That would involve no extraneous additional pressure on the defendant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That would involve no extraneous additional pressure on the defendant.

stems_affixes.word_buile: extra以外,超过+curriculum课程表→adj.课外的
extra以外,超过+aneous……的→从外面来的
extra以外,超过+ordinary普通的→超出普通
extra以外,超过+solar太阳的→adj.太阳系以外的
extra以外,超过+vag漫游,走+ant……的→走得过分→奢侈的
extra以外,超过+violet紫色的→adj.紫外线的
extra以外,超过+vert转→[性格]向外转→外向
extra以外,超过+vert转→[性格]向外转→外向
extra以外,超过+polate放→放到[事实]外→推断
extempore即席的,当场的+aneous多……的,……特征的→即席,当场
miscell=misc混淆+aneous多……的→adj.多种的,混杂的
simult类似+aneous多……的,……特征的→时间相同的
spont=spond+aneous多……的,……特征的→自内心的承诺

sentences.cn: 故事里与正题无关的情节

sentences.cn: 他对失火事件的描述含有大量离题的细节。
